C2 a vote in which all the people in a country or an area are asked to give their opinion about or decide an important political or social question: Is it more democratic to hold a referendum, rather than let the government alone decide?
More examplesFewer examplesA nationwide referendum will be held to decide the issue.The opposition are demanding a referendum on the issue.A referendum was held on the question of whether the U.K. should remain a member of the European Community.The proposed referendum is consultative only and is not binding on Parliament.There has been much debate over the exact wording of the referendum.
